about.summary: The XML C parser and toolkit of Gnome.

name: libxml2
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "2.9.4" %}

package:
  name: libxml2
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: libxml2-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://git.gnome.org/browse/libxml2/snapshot/libxml2-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 1d5257abac02aab323bf6ab26199ce0bb2a7b798bb7acea302e136438237268a
  patches:
    # Bug 767063 - Fix build of libxml2 2.9.4 (git master) on pre-C99 compilers.
    - pre-c99.patch
    # https://bugzilla.gnome.org/show_bug.cgi?id=766834
    - fix-attribute-decoding-during-xml-schema-validation.patch

build:
  number: 4
  skip: True  # [win and [py>35]
  features:
    - vc9  # [win and py27]
    - vc10  # [win and py34]
    - vc14  # [win and py>=35]

requirements:
  build:
    - python  # [win]
    - autoconf  # [not win]
    - automake  # [not win]
    - libtool  # [not win]
    - pkg-config  # [not win]
    - icu 58.*  # [not win]
    - libiconv
    - zlib 1.2.*
    - xz 5.2.*  # [not win]
    - vc 9  # [win and py27]
    - vc 10  # [win and py34]
    - vc 14  # [win and py>=35]
  run:
    - icu 58.*  # [not win]
    - libiconv
    - zlib 1.2.*
    - xz 5.2.*  # [not win]
    - vc 9  # [win and py27]
    - vc 10  # [win and py34]
    - vc 14  # [win and py35]

test:
  files:
    - test.xml
  commands:
    - xmllint test.xml
    - conda inspect linkages -p $PREFIX libxml2  # [not win]
    - conda inspect objects -p $PREFIX libxml2  # [osx]

about:
  home: http://xmlsoft.org/
  license: MIT
  license_file: Copyright
  summary: 'The XML C parser and toolkit of Gnome.'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - ocefpaf
    - jakirkham
    - gillins
    - jschueller

about.summary: The XML C parser and toolkit of Gnome.
